local mizejiciBlok = script.Parent

local function zmizniBlok()
	mizejiciBlok.CanCollide = false
	mizejiciBlok.Transparency = 1
end

local function zobrazBlok()
	mizejiciBlok.CanCollide = true
	mizejiciBlok.Transparency = 0
end

while true do
	zmizniBlok()
	wait(1)
	zobrazBlok()
	wait(1)
end

local blok = script.Parent

local function postupneZmizni()
	for krok = 1, 10 do
		blok.Transparency = krok / 10
		wait(0.1)
	end
	
	blok.CanCollide = false
	wait(3)
	
	blok.CanCollide = true
	blok.Transparency = 0
end

blok.Touched:Connect(postupneZmizni)

local function zabijHrace(castHrace)

	local najdiRodice = castHrace.Parent
	local clovek = najdiRodice:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")

	if clovek then
		clovek.Health = 0
	end

end

local past = script.Parent

past.Touched:Connect(zabijHrace)

local blok = script.Parent

local function jedNahoru()
	for i = 1, 50 do
		blok.CFrame = blok.CFrame * CFrame.new(0,0.3,0)
		wait(0.01)
	end
end

local function jedDolu()
	for i = 1, 50 do
		blok.CFrame = blok.CFrame * CFrame.new(0,-0.3,0)
		wait(0.01)
	end
end

while true do
	wait(1)
	jedNahoru()
	wait(1)
	jedDolu()
end

local blok = script.Parent

while true do
	wait()
	blok.CFrame = blok.CFrame * CFrame.fromEulerAnglesXYZ(0.1,0,0)
end

local zona = script.Parent
local jsemUvnitr = false

local function uberZivot(blok)
	local rodic = blok.Parent
	local clovek = rodic:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
	if clovek then
		jsemUvnitr = true
		while jsemUvnitr do
			clovek.Health = clovek.Health - 2
			wait(0.3)
		end
	end
end

local function vylez()
	jsemUvnitr = false
end

zona.Touched:Connect(uberZivot)
zona.TouchEnded:Connect(vylez)

	local najdiRodice = castHrace.Parent

local baf = script.Parent.Parent:findFirstChild("Baf")
local bafObrazek = baf:findFirstChild("scary")

local function posouvejBaf()
	for i = 1, 30 do
		baf.CFrame = baf.CFrame * CFrame.new(0,0,-0.3)
		wait(0.001)
	end
end

local function zobrazBaf()
	bafObrazek.Transparency = 0
end

local function schovejBaf()
	bafObrazek.Transparency = 1
end

local function spustPoSlapnuti(castHrace)
	local rodic = castHrace.Parent
	local clovek = rodic:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
	if clovek then
		zobrazBaf()
		posouvejBaf()
		schovejBaf()
	end
end

local zona = script.Parent
zona.Touched:Connect(spustPoSlapnuti)

local cas = 0
local osvetleni = game:GetService("Lighting")

while true do
	cas = cas + 0.1
	if cas > 24 then
		cas = 0
	end

	osvetleni.ClockTime = cas
	wait(0.1)
end

local sluzbaHraci = game:GetService("Players")

local function kdyzSePridaPostava(postava, hrac)
	hrac:SetAttribute("IsAlive", true)
	local ridicPostavy = postava:WaitForChild("Humanoid")
	ridicPostavy.Died:Connect(function()
		local body = hrac.leaderstats.Points
		body.Value = 0
		hrac:SetAttribute("IsAlive", false)
	end)
end

local function kdyzSePridaHrac(hrac)
	local zebricek = Instance.new("Folder")
	zebricek.Name = "leaderstats"
	zebricek.Parent = hrac

	local body = Instance.new("IntValue")
	body.Name = "Points"
	body.Value = 0
	body.Parent = zebricek

	hrac:SetAttribute("IsAlive", false)

	hrac.CharacterAdded:Connect(function(postava)
		kdyzSePridaPostava(postava, hrac)
	end)
end

sluzbaHraci.PlayerAdded:Connect(kdyzSePridaHrac)

while true do
	wait(1)
	local seznamHracu = sluzbaHraci:GetPlayers()
	for i = 1, #seznamHracu  do
		local hrac = seznamHracu[i]
		if hrac:GetAttribute("IsAlive") then
			local body = hrac.leaderstats.Points
			body.Value = body.Value + 1
		end
	end
end

-- n√°pady na zlep≈°en√≠: synchronizovat ƒças p≈ôes tween service, a≈• to nep≈ôid√°v√° body nav√≠c za ka≈ædou ƒç√°st tƒõla, co se dotkla

local blok = script.Parent

local jsemUvnitr = false
blok.Color = Color3.new(1, .4, .2)

local function pridejBodyHraci(jmenoHrace)
	local hraci = game:GetService("Players")
	local seznamHracu = hraci:GetPlayers()

	for i = 1, #seznamHracu  do
		local hracZeSeznamu = seznamHracu[i]
		local jeToNasHrac = hracZeSeznamu.Name == jmenoHrace

		if jeToNasHrac then
			local body = hracZeSeznamu.leaderstats.Points
			body.Value = body.Value + 1
		end
	end
end

local function pridavejBodyNavic(castTelaCoSeDotkla)
	local celekTela = castTelaCoSeDotkla.Parent
	local jeToClovek = celekTela:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
	
	if jeToClovek then
		jsemUvnitr = true
		blok.Color = Color3.new(.4, 1, .2)
		
		while jsemUvnitr do
			wait(1)
			local jmenoCloveka = celekTela.Name
			pridejBodyHraci(jmenoCloveka)
		end
	end
	
end

local function prestanPridavatBody()
	jsemUvnitr = false
	blok.Color = Color3.new(1, .4, .2)
end

blok.Touched:Connect(pridavejBodyNavic)
blok.TouchEnded:Connect(prestanPridavatBody)

local sluzbaHraci = game:GetService("Players")

local function kdyzSePridaHrac(hrac)
	-- leaderstats = speci√°ln√≠ slo≈æka, kterou Roblox uk√°≈æe v tabulce hr√°ƒç≈Ø
	local zebricek = Instance.new("Folder")
	zebricek.Name = "leaderstats"
	zebricek.Parent = hrac

	local pocetCoinu = Instance.new("IntValue")
	pocetCoinu.Name = "Coins"
	pocetCoinu.Value = 0
	pocetCoinu.Parent = zebricek
end

sluzbaHraci.PlayerAdded:Connect(kdyzSePridaHrac)

local mince = script.Parent
local uzSebrane = false

local function priDotyku(dotek)
	if uzSebrane then return end

	local postava = dotek.Parent
	local ridicPostavy = postava:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
	if not ridicPostavy then return end

	local hrac = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(postava)
	if not hrac then return end

	local zebricek = hrac:FindFirstChild("leaderstats")
	if not zebricek then return end

	local pocetCoinu = zebricek:FindFirstChild("Coins")
	if not pocetCoinu then return end

	uzSebrane = true
	pocetCoinu.Value = pocetCoinu.Value + 1

	-- udƒõlej minci ‚Äûpryƒç‚Äú
	mince.Transparency = 1
	mince.CanCollide = false
	mince:Destroy()
end

mince.Touched:Connect(priDotyku)

local kontrolniBod = script.Parent -- SpawnLocation

local function priDotyku(dotek)
	local postava = dotek.Parent
	local ridicPostavy = postava:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
	if not ridicPostavy then return end

	local hrac = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(postava)
	if not hrac then return end

	hrac.RespawnLocation = kontrolniBod
end

kontrolniBod.Touched:Connect(priDotyku)

local blok = script.Parent

while true do
	blok.Transparency = 0
	wait(0.2)
	blok.Transparency = 0.7
	wait(0.2)
end

local cil = script.Parent
local potrebneCoiny = 10 -- zmƒõ≈à na 0, pokud nechce≈° kontrolu coin≈Ø

local function ukazVyhru(hrac)
	local rozhraniHrace = hrac:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")
	if rozhraniHrace:FindFirstChild("WinGui") then return end

	local obrazovka = Instance.new("ScreenGui")
	obrazovka.Name = "WinGui"
	obrazovka.ResetOnSpawn = false
	obrazovka.Parent = rozhraniHrace

	local napis = Instance.new("TextLabel")
	napis.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0.2, 0)
	napis.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0.4, 0)
	napis.BackgroundTransparency = 1
	napis.TextScaled = true
	napis.Text = "Vyhr√°l jsi! üéâ"
	napis.Parent = obrazovka
end

local function priDotyku(dotek)
	local postava = dotek.Parent
	local ridicPostavy = postava:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
	if not ridicPostavy then return end

	local hrac = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(postava)
	if not hrac then return end

	if potrebneCoiny > 0 then
		local zebricek = hrac:FindFirstChild("leaderstats")
		local pocetCoinu = zebricek and zebricek:FindFirstChild("Coins")
		if not pocetCoinu or pocetCoinu.Value < potrebneCoiny then
			return
		end
	end

	ukazVyhru(hrac)
end

cil.Touched:Connect(priDotyku)

local bezpecnaZona = script.Parent

local function priDotyku(dotek)
	local postava = dotek.Parent
	local ridicPostavy = postava:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
	if not ridicPostavy then return end

	local hrac = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(postava)
	if not hrac then return end

	local obrazovka = hrac:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")
	if obrazovka:FindFirstChild("SafeWinGui") then return end

	local obrazovkaVrstva = Instance.new("ScreenGui")
	obrazovkaVrstva.Name = "SafeWinGui"
	obrazovkaVrstva.Parent = obrazovka

	local napis = Instance.new("TextLabel")
	napis.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 0.18, 0)
	napis.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0.4, 0)
	napis.BackgroundTransparency = 1
	napis.TextScaled = true
	napis.Text = "Jsi v safe z√≥nƒõ!"
	napis.Parent = obrazovkaVrstva
end

bezpecnaZona.Touched:Connect(priDotyku)

local bonusObjekt = script.Parent
local bonusSkok = 90
local trvani = 8

local function priDotyku(dotek)
	local postava = dotek.Parent
	local ridicPostavy = postava:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
	if not ridicPostavy then return end

	local puvodni = ridicPostavy.JumpPower
	ridicPostavy.JumpPower = bonusSkok
	wait(trvani)
	ridicPostavy.JumpPower = puvodni
end

bonusObjekt.Touched:Connect(priDotyku)

local delkaKola = 60

local function pridejCasovacRozhrani(hrac)
	local rozhraniHrace = hrac:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")

	local obrazovka = Instance.new("ScreenGui")
	obrazovka.Name = "RoundTimerGui"
	obrazovka.ResetOnSpawn = false
	obrazovka.Parent = rozhraniHrace

	local napis = Instance.new("TextLabel")
	napis.Name = "TimerLabel"
	napis.Size = UDim2.new(0.25, 0, 0.08, 0)
	napis.Position = UDim2.new(0.02, 0, 0.02, 0)
	napis.TextScaled = true
	napis.Text = "ƒåas: " .. delkaKola
	napis.Parent = obrazovka

	for sekunda = delkaKola, 0, -1 do
		napis.Text = "ƒåas: " .. sekunda
		wait(1)
	end
end

game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(pridejCasovacRozhrani)

local klicObjekt = script.Parent
local sebrano = false

local function priDotyku(dotek)
	if sebrano then return end
	local postava = dotek.Parent
	local ridicPostavy = postava:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
	if not ridicPostavy then return end

	local hrac = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(postava)
	if not hrac then return end

	local statistiky = hrac:FindFirstChild("leaderstats")
	if not statistiky then return end

	local pocetKlicu = statistiky:FindFirstChild("Keys")
	if not pocetKlicu then
		pocetKlicu = Instance.new("IntValue")
		pocetKlicu.Name = "Keys"
		pocetKlicu.Value = 0
		pocetKlicu.Parent = statistiky
	end

	sebrano = true
	pocetKlicu.Value = pocetKlicu.Value + 1
	klicObjekt:Destroy()
end

klicObjekt.Touched:Connect(priDotyku)

local dvere = script.Parent
local potrebaKlicu = 3

local function priDotyku(dotek)
	local postava = dotek.Parent
	local ridicPostavy = postava:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
	if not ridicPostavy then return end

	local hrac = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(postava)
	if not hrac then return end

	local statistiky = hrac:FindFirstChild("leaderstats")
	local pocetKlicu = statistiky and statistiky:FindFirstChild("Keys")

	if pocetKlicu and pocetKlicu.Value >= potrebaKlicu then
		dvere.CanCollide = false
		dvere.Transparency = 0.8
	end
end

dvere.Touched:Connect(priDotyku)

local slozkaKlicu = workspace:WaitForChild("Keys")
local slozkaPozic = workspace:WaitForChild("KeySpawns")

local poziceSpawnu = slozkaPozic:GetChildren()
local pocetKlicu = slozkaKlicu:GetChildren()

for i = 1, #pocetKlicu do
	local poradiPozice = math.random(1, #poziceSpawnu)
	local cilovaPozice = poziceSpawnu[poradiPozice]
	pocetKlicu[i].Position = cilovaPozice.Position
end

local function pridejRozhrani(hrac)
	local rozhraniHrace = hrac:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")

	local obrazovka = Instance.new("ScreenGui")
	obrazovka.Name = "KeyChecklistGui"
	obrazovka.ResetOnSpawn = false
	obrazovka.Parent = rozhraniHrace

	local napis = Instance.new("TextLabel")
	napis.Size = UDim2.new(0.3, 0, 0.09, 0)
	napis.Position = UDim2.new(0.02, 0, 0.12, 0)
	napis.TextScaled = true
	napis.Text = "Kl√≠ƒçe: 0/3"
	napis.Parent = obrazovka

	while true do
		wait(0.2)
		local statistiky = hrac:FindFirstChild("leaderstats")
		local pocetKlicu = statistiky and statistiky:FindFirstChild("Keys")
		local hodnota = pocetKlicu and pocetKlicu.Value or 0
		napis.Text = "Kl√≠ƒçe: " .. hodnota .. "/3"
	end
end

game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(pridejRozhrani)

local spinac = script.Parent
local zvuk = spinac:FindFirstChild("KeySound")
local svetlo = spinac:FindFirstChild("PointLight")

local function priDotyku(dotek)
	local postava = dotek.Parent
	local ridicPostavy = postava:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
	if not ridicPostavy then return end

	if zvuk then
		zvuk:Play()
	end

	if svetlo then
		svetlo.Enabled = true
		wait(0.4)
		svetlo.Enabled = false
	end
end

spinac.Touched:Connect(priDotyku)
